channel.title: Shell on The Sound of Music
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on The Sound of Music

item.title: Windows - 系统 - 垃圾清理 - 脚本
item.description: 清理系统垃圾 @echo off echo 正在清除系统垃圾文件，请稍等...... del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\Windows\Temp\*.* del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\Windows\ServiceProfiles\NetworkService\AppData\Local\Temp\*.* del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\Windows\ServiceProfiles\LocalService\AppData\Local\Temp\*.* del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\*._mp del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\*.log del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\*.gid del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\*.chk del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\*.old del /f /s /q %systemdrive%\recycled\*.* del /f /s /q %windir%\*.bak del /f /s /q %windir%\prefetch\*.* rd /s /q %windir%\temp & md %windir%\temp del /f /q %userprofile%\cookies\*.
